item.title: Linux Newbie: Running Manjaro on MacBookPro
item.description: The article explains how to install and set up Manjaro KDE on your Apple MacBook Pro (Early 2015) Retina 13". If you are a Linux newbie and want to try Manjaro too, this guide is for you! Installation First of all, itâ€™s recommended to use the stable version from Manjaro. You can download the image file at its official website, and can create a bootable USB stick from that. If you never did this before, there is a step by step guide here on the website.
